name: Witch Hunt (PowerPoint Demo)
description:
This PowerPoint game was a requirement for school that I took too seriously. They asked for a simple game in PPT, I decided to make this.

Note: You should play this on PowerPoint, I can't guarantee it'll work right with other PPTX players.

Synopsis:

A short story about a witch on the run and the kind human that helps her. This game introduces the characters of the story (whether or not I continue this on Ren'py is still undecided).

Morgan: A young but powerful witch. Not much is know about her or her past other than she is a kind girl with family who also seem to be witches.

Ben: An average guy who lives alone. His parents work abroad, his aunt coming by every now and then to check up on him and help around the house. He studies art.

Silverblades: An organization of monster hunters. They hunt vampires, werewolves, witches, etc. Anything that is out of the ordinary is fair game to them.
